00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "KviTimeUtils.h"
00029 #include "KviQString.h"
00030 
00031 #include <QStringList>
00032 
00033 //
00034 // This class is used as container for miscelaneous connection state variables
00035 // that do not have a class for their own.
00036 // If you need to add some "minor" variable to the connection state then
00037 // this is the right place for it.
00038 //
00039 
00040 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionStateData
00041 {
00042         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00043         friend class KviIrcServerParser;
00044         friend class KviUserParser;
00045 public:
00046         KviIrcConnectionStateData();
00047         ~KviIrcConnectionStateData();
00048 protected:
00049 
00050         // The members of this enum must be in the correct
00051         // order since the nickname selection algorithm
00052         // uses their numeric values for comparisons.
00053         enum LoginNickNameState
00054         {
00055                 UsedConnectionSpecificNickName,
00056                 UsedProfileSpecificNickName,
00057                 UsedAlternativeProfileSpecificNickName,
00058                 UsedServerSpecificNickName,
00059                 UsedAlternativeServerSpecificNickName,
00060                 UsedNetworkSpecificNickName,
00061                 UsedAlternativeNetworkSpecificNickName,
00062                 UsedGlobalNickName1,
00063                 UsedGlobalNickName2,
00064                 UsedGlobalNickName3,
00065                 UsedGlobalNickName4,
00066                 UsedRandomNickName1,
00067                 UsedRandomNickName2,
00068                 UsedRandomNickName3,
00069                 UsedRandomNickName4,
00070                 UsedManualNickname // Given up assigning it automatically
00071         };
00072 
00076         LoginNickNameState m_eLoginNickNameState;
00077 
00078 
00079         bool         m_bInsideInitialCapLs;                  // true if there's a CAP LS request pending
00080         bool         m_bIgnoreOneYouHaveNotRegisteredError; // true if we have sent a CAP LS request followed by a PING which will generate an error (and we need to ignore it)
00081         bool         m_bInsideInitialCapReq;                 // true if there's a CAP REQ request pending
00082         bool         m_bInsideAuthenticate;           // true if there's a AUTHENTICATE request pending
00083         bool         m_bSentStartTls;                 // the state of STARTTLS protocol
00084         bool         m_bSentQuit;                     // have we sent the quit message for this connection ?
00085         QString      m_szCommandToExecAfterConnect;   // yes.. this is a special command to execute after connection
00086         bool         m_bSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect; // this is set to true if we have to simulate an unexpected disconnect even if we have sent a normal quit message
00087         kvi_time_t   m_tLastReceivedChannelWhoReply;  // the time that we have received our last channel who reply
00088         kvi_time_t   m_tLastSentChannelWhoRequest;    // the time that we have sent our last channel who request
00089         kvi_time_t   m_tLastReceivedWhoisReply;       // the time that we have received the last whois reply, reset to 0 when we receive an /END OF WHOIS
00090         QStringList  m_lEnabledCaps;                  // the CAPs currently enabled
00091         bool         m_bIdentifyMsgCapabilityEnabled; // do we have the msg-identity CAP enabled ?
00092 public:
00093 
00097         void setLoginNickNameState(const LoginNickNameState &eLoginNickNameState)
00098         {
00099                 m_eLoginNickNameState = eLoginNickNameState;
00100         }
00101 
00105         const LoginNickNameState & loginNickNameState() const
00106         {
00107                 return m_eLoginNickNameState;
00108         }
00109 
00110         const QStringList & enabledCaps(){ return m_lEnabledCaps; };
00111         void changeEnabledCapList(const QString &szCapList);
00112 
00113         bool identifyMsgCapabilityEnabled() const
00114                 { return m_bIdentifyMsgCapabilityEnabled; };
00115 
00116         bool sentStartTls(){ return m_bSentStartTls; };
00117         void setSentStartTls(){ m_bSentStartTls = true; };
00118 
00119         bool isInsideAuthenticate(){ return m_bInsideAuthenticate; };
00120         void setInsideAuthenticate(bool bInside){ m_bInsideAuthenticate = bInside; };
00121 
00122         bool isInsideInitialCapLs(){ return m_bInsideInitialCapLs; };
00123         void setInsideInitialCapLs(bool bInside){ m_bInsideInitialCapLs = bInside; };
00124 
00125         void setIgnoreOneYouHaveNotRegisteredError(bool bIgnore)
00126                 { m_bIgnoreOneYouHaveNotRegisteredError = bIgnore; };
00127         bool ignoreOneYouHaveNotRegisteredError() const
00128                 { return m_bIgnoreOneYouHaveNotRegisteredError; };
00129 
00130         bool isInsideInitialCapReq(){ return m_bInsideInitialCapReq; };
00131         void setInsideInitialCapReq(bool bInside){ m_bInsideInitialCapReq = bInside; };
00132 
00133         bool sentQuit(){ return m_bSentQuit; };
00134         void setSentQuit(){ m_bSentQuit = true; };
00135 
00136         kvi_time_t lastReceivedChannelWhoReply(){ return m_tLastReceivedChannelWhoReply; };
00137         void setLastReceivedChannelWhoReply(kvi_time_t tTime){ m_tLastReceivedChannelWhoReply = tTime; };
00138 
00139         kvi_time_t lastSentChannelWhoRequest(){ return m_tLastSentChannelWhoRequest; };
00140         void setLastSentChannelWhoRequest(kvi_time_t tTime){ m_tLastSentChannelWhoRequest = tTime; };
00141 
00142         kvi_time_t lastReceivedWhoisReply(){ return m_tLastReceivedWhoisReply; };
00143         void setLastReceivedWhoisReply(kvi_time_t tTime){ m_tLastReceivedWhoisReply = tTime; };
00144 
00145         bool simulateUnexpectedDisconnect(){ return m_bSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect; };
00146         void setSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect(bool bSimulate){ m_bSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect = bSimulate; };
00147 
00148         const QString & commandToExecAfterConnect(){ return m_szCommandToExecAfterConnect; };
00149         void setCommandToExecAfterConnect(const QString &szCmd){ m_szCommandToExecAfterConnect = szCmd; };
00150 };
00151 
00152 #endif //!_KVI_IRCCONNECTIONSTATEDATA_H_
